summary: A TensorFlow implementation that extends the XLNet architecture with a language modeling head, enabling the model to predict token probabilities for tasks such as text generation and fine‑tuning on downstream NLP applications.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use XLNet language model component for developers and researchers to integrate into text generation, completion, and other natural language processing pipelines, facilitating fine‑tuning and deployment in production environments.
